data.description: Handmade ceramic lamp with a unique design, featuring printed decoration of green leaves. It is part of the Apilar collection, inspired by Spanish ceramics, with nine different shapes that can be stacked to create complex compositions. The lamp has a height of 17.7 inches and a diameter of 7.9 inches. It comes in forest green, white, mint, burgundy, and orange.

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.
uniqueAttributes.Ceramic prints: On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by past traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.
uniqueAttributes.Cultural significance: The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on ‏traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and ‏searching for the sense of belonging through the local material culture.
uniqueAttributes.Limited production: This piece is part of a limited collection, ensuring its exclusivity and value as a unique work of art.

data.product: Restored Black and White Cocktail Chair
data.description:
Dimensions in cm
H 66 cm (seat 40 cm) W 52 cm x D 47 cmin ich
H 25,98 in (seat 15,7 in) W 20,47 in x D 18,5 in
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The mass production of this iconic piece so characteristic of the whole Mid-Century modern era started at the end of the fifties and went on as late as the beginning of the eighties. Mirroring the trends of the times its turned legs were cone shape typically with a nude chellac finish. The fan shaped steaming of the upholstery elegantly emphasizes the curve of the back. Due to its size this comfortable and versatile piece is also easy to move. We used high quality, black and white colored upholstery fabric for the refurbishment.
Our manufactory is specialized in the restoration of mid century modern furniture from the 50’s, 60’s, and 70’s.

uniqueAttributes.Authenticity: This cocktail chair is completely restored from the 1970's, offering a genuine vintage piece that is not available in generic counterparts.
uniqueAttributes.Historical significance: The chair represents the iconic Mid-Century modern era, capturing the design trends and craftsmanship of that time period.

uniqueAttributes.High-quality materials: The use of high-quality upholstery fabric in the refurbishment ensures durability and a premium look that exceeds generic products.
uniqueAttributes.Unique craftsmanship: Our manufactory specializes in the restoration of mid century modern furniture, bringing expertise and attention to detail that is not found in mass-produced items.

data.description:
A beautiful hand-built small amphora vase with black and white triangle pattern. It works great as a decorative item or can carry beautifully a bouquet of small flowers/a little tree branch. It was made of speckled stoneware clay, handpainted with black underglaze, and dipped in glossy white upon which it was fired to cone 8 (1250C) in an electric kiln. The base was left unglazed and is impressed with my maker's mark.

DIMENSIONS & MATERIALS:
~ speckled stoneware clay, non toxic glossy white glaze
~ app. 13.5cm high and 9cm wide (5.3" x 3.5")

Dishwasher safe.

CONDITION OF THE PRODUCTS
Because all our pieces are handcrafted, there may be minor variations form item to item.

data.description:
Our doormats are high quality 100% coir. They are hand painted by me with outdoor industrial paint that has a built in UV protection to help protect the design from wear and fading. Each mat is backed with a slip-resistant sturdy PVC rubber backing. We offer a variety of sizes and all of our mats are 1 inch thick. 
The mats are best placed under a covered area such as a porch, we do not recommend placing mat in areas of direct sunlight, rain, or snow.
CARE: clean by giving the mat a good shake. Best to keep in a dry area such as a covered entryway, we DO NOT recommend direct sunlight, rain or snow as that will fade & cause wear to your doormat!
Due to the nature of our product, RETURNS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED DUE TO WEAR OR FADING. Doormats will not be refunded or replaced from wear.*FLAWED DOORMATS: When we order our doormats, some come with slight imperfections such as dark spots, slight staining, small chipped corner or a small hole on the back of the mat not visible from the front of the doormat. If you are interested in a flawed doormat please send us a message and we will let you know if we have any in stock. If we do have any available, we will send you a photo of the doormat for you to approve before moving forward on the order. PLEASE NOTE, all flawed doormats are sold at a HUGE discounted price and all sales are FINAL. You are agreeing to the flaws during messaging and finalize the sale when you purchase the doormat.
We suggest replacing your doormat every few months as doormats tend to be a seasonal item. We are always adding more items so be sure to check back here for our new designs :)
Each mat is unique. Some may be darker or lighter than the photo, coir is made from the husks of coconuts and some fibers might be thicker or thinner than others. There may also be chunks of the husks in the fibers.
We love CUSTOM ORDERS! Message us and let us know what you have in mind and we'll make it happen

data.description:
The Black Shade Wall Sconce is a versatile and stylish lighting fixture perfect for a variety of settings, including bedrooms, bathrooms, and industrial spaces.

This sconce features a durable gloss black finish and a 10-inch shade with a white interior. The shade is adjustable from 90 to 180 degrees, allowing you to direct light where it is needed. The sconce is turned on and off using a key switch located on the socket, adding a unique and vintage touch.

The Black Shade Wall Sconce is available in three finish options - black, brushed nickel, and antique brass - all of which are durable and designed to withstand daily use and wear and tear. It is also UL listed and thoroughly tested before leaving the shop, ensuring its safety and compliance with electrical standards.

data.description: The Antique Brass Sconce is a modern farmhouse wall sconce with a hand spun matte finish porcelain enamel coated shade. It comes in various finish options: raw brass, black, brushed nickel, polished nickel, and antique brass. The raw brass finish features solid unfinished brass that will age and patina over time, giving it a natural look. The black finish is a durable satin powder coated finish, while the brushed nickel has a lightly brushed semi-satin finish. The polished nickel finish is a mirror like metallic finish with a warm feel, and the antique brass finish is made of solid brass that has been aged and lacquer sealed. The lamp is UL listed and thoroughly tested before leaving the shop, and it is compatible with a dimmer switch. It is recommended to use LED Edison 7w (60w) bulbs, which can be purchased separately. The dimensions of the sconce are as follows: height: 9", width: 7", depth: 10". The shade is 4.25" high and 7" wide, and the clearance from the wall is 2.55". The light fixture is compatible with incandescent, LED, compact fluorescent, or any other standard E26 base bulb up to 60 watts. It is recommended to use LED bulbs to keep the lamp temperature cool. Please provide a physical address to qualify for free shipping. Due to package size, additional charges may apply for shipping to a P.O. Box.

data.description:
Our green linen bedding set it’s not just soft. It’s the kind of soft that feels like wrapping yourself in a best friend’s hug after a long day.
Here at SOUTH, we don't do shortcuts. We are crazy about effortless luxury, comfort, sustainability, and quality. That means we use only top-notch CERTIFIED 100% organic, enzyme-washed flax fabric that won't shrink and will become an heirloom piece at your home - the more you use it, the more fabulous, soft, and YOURS it will become!

WHY OUR LINEN IS SO AMAZING?

Linen is a very durable, strong fabric that has antibacterial, antistatic, and hygroscopic properties. Also due to its natural qualities, linen is comfortable in all seasons as it keeps you cool when it is hot and warm when it is cold. Also, we use only the highest quality linen directly from Lithuanian flax mills, which means it's very durable and you will use it for many many years.

Airy and lightweight, SAUTHS linen bedding is all about the effortless luxury we love to embrace. Our OEKO-TEX certified linen( this means that it is made free of harmful chemicals and is safe for human use) duvet covers are also incredibly durable, and their texture - can you believe it? - only improves with time.
Top-quality European linen outperforms all other materials and makes all our products naturally strong, lustrous, and durable. Our products are organic and fully biodegradable.
The natural properties of linen provide added comfort, allow your skin to breathe, and maintain optimum skin temperature and PH balance.
Pre-washed linen collection has a special stone wash finish. The fabric feels soft yet very strong and long-lasting.

data.description:
100% Natural Soy + Essential Oil Candle
Cypress / Hinoki / Grapefruit

The scent of fresh mountain air.
A cloud of cool mist, rolling through old-growth forests.
The clean aroma of Japanese Cypress and dry Cedar, washed clean in a bath of sparkling Pink Grapefruit, create an atmosphere of clarity and tranquility.

Use for: Clarity and Awareness ( see below )

+ 100% Natural
+ Scented exclusively with essential oils
+ 8 oz / up to 50 hr
+ Vegan
+ USA Made Vessel
+ Hand-poured in Rhode Island
+ 3.5" high x 2.5" wide

---- Folklore ----
The Tree of Purity
Once worshiped as a symbol of the sun goddess, The Hinoki tree has been revered as sacred in Japan for centuries. An emblem of purity and grace, the timber of the fragrant wood has been a traditionally used to build the most sacred of places; shrines and temples.

Still used in many Shinto ceremonies today, Its been said that even when cut down, the spiritual essence of the tree is still intact, aiding in its ability to create a restorative atmosphere.

Uniquely, the Hinoki woods of Japan fail to prosper in polluted environments, such as cities. Instead, growing mainly in areas where the air and water are exceptionally pure. The birthplace of Shirin-Yoku ( Forest Bathing ) originated in the Hinoki forests of Akasawa.

uniqueAttributes.100% Natural: Made with 100% natural soy and essential oils, providing a pure and eco-friendly candle experience.
uniqueAttributes.Unique Scent: The combination of Cypress, Hinoki, and Grapefruit essential oils creates a distinctive and refreshing scent that evokes the atmosphere of a mountain forest.
uniqueAttributes.Clarity and Awareness: Specifically designed to promote clarity and awareness, making it an ideal candle for meditation, yoga, or any activity that requires mental focus.
uniqueAttributes.Sacred Symbolism: Hinoki wood has been revered as sacred in Japan for centuries, representing purity and grace. This candle brings a touch of that sacredness into your home.

This small wooden stool embodies Scandinavian decor with its minimalist design and natural wood finish. Crafted for versatility, it seamlessly fits into any space, offering both functionality and timeless style. A perfect addition for those seeking a touch of Nordic charm.

STOOL DETAILS
⚬ COLOR CHOICE - We have two color samplers. Sampler 1 is our standard swatch. You can choose a shade by changing the color on the right side of the product. Among the shades available for selection are: Natural, Walnut, Oak, Light Oak, Antic Oak, Teak or Black
We also have an additional swatch - Sampler 2. These are our latest colors. If frozen green, winter blush, or other shades from this swatch caught your eye, you can purchase a piece of furniture by selecting any shade from the list, and in the comments to your order, enter the correct name of the shade you would like to receive, or contact me by sending a private message - I will guide you through the purchase process.

⚬ Finished with a natural hard wax oil.

The planter is suitable for all house plants, especially those that like facing the sun. It can be rotated to any direction on its brass stand, making it easy to adjust the plant's position. Plants can also be placed with their pots inside the planter, in which case the separator functions as a platform for the pot.

data.description: These cards are a coaching and therapy tool that helps users explore metaphors and their associations, leading to deep insights and fresh perspectives. They are useful for therapists, counselors, designers, teachers, team leaders, and anyone seeking innovative problem-solving methods. The cards provide new ways to analyze and solve problems by encouraging users to select a metaphor that resonates with their focus, challenge, or session objective. By delving into the metaphor's associations and reflecting on its relevance, participants can spark insights, unique viewpoints, and innovative ideas. The cards act like a 'creative button,' helping users break free from usual thought patterns and explore fresh ideas. Key features of the cards include engagement and interaction, breakthroughs and transformations, and digital convenience. They promote active participation and dynamic discussions, making learning more engaging and memorable. Associative thinking can lead to breakthrough moments, helping overcome obstacles and progress in personal and emotional development. Access to the cards in digital format makes them a versatile tool for both in-person and virtual sessions, providing greater flexibility and convenience.
